mapper.select: select ms.*, m.name, s.name from tbl_material_supplier ms, tbl_material m, t_supplier s where sm.status = 1 and sm.materialid = m.id and sm.supplierid = s.id and ms.id = #{materialId}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_material_supplier(id, materialId, supplierId, modifydate, remark, status) values(#{id}, #{materialId}, #{supplierId}, sysdate(), #{remark}, #{status})
mapper.update: update tbl_material_supplier set status = '0', modifydate = sysdate() where id = #{id}
